author: daxian-dbw
body:
- [x] Resolves issue #1634 .
- [x] Code is [rebased][sync] on `origin/master`.

This PR also update the TPA list in pwrshcommon.cpp based on .NET Core RTM libraries.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body:
LGTM, thanks for the heads up.

Rebase for a new build.

title: Make the assembly version of AssemblyLoadContext.dll to be 3.0.0.0, so that the ALC.dll from PowerShell Core can work with existing native hosts in NanoServer
